author: markt
msg: Use full paths in log messages to remove ambiguity

author: ab
msg: NUTCH-797 Fix parse-tika and parse-html to use relative URL resolution per RFC-3986.

author: jukka
msg: JCR-3005: Make it possible to get multiple nodes in one call via davex
Use :include parameters in a normal batch read request to signal a multi-read request.
Add a -DJCR-3005=true feature flag for enabling this functionality until finalized.
